docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 2 -- The United States policy of patience in Cuba has received the approval and sympathy of the Governments of the four countries President Eisenhower has visited on his current trip.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, March 3 -- Relations between the United States and South American lands appeared today to stand on the highest plateau since the end of World War II as President Eisenhower flew homeward after a ten-day visit to four countries on this...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, March 3 -- Relations between the United States and South American lands appeared today to stand on the highest plateau since the end of World War II as President Eisenhower flew homeward after a ten-day visit to four countries on this continent.
